metadata.title: CVE-2018-16750 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - negligible
metadata.description:
In ImageMagick 7.0.7-29 and earlier, a memory leak in theformatIPTCfromBuffer function in coders/meta.c was found.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2018-16750` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

imagemagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
imagemagick-common - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
libmagick++5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
libmagickcore5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
libmagickcore5-extra - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
libmagickwand5 - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
perlmagick - 8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13
No subscription required

criterions.comment: imagemagick package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '8:6.7.7.10-6ubuntu3.13').
